author: Chuck Taggart
description: Bittersweet and spicy with underlying warming apple spirit. Originally designed to be served straight-up in a Nick & Nora glass, we think it's better suited to being served on-the-rocks, preferably over a chunk of block ice.
name: RÃ©veillon Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 7.5 ml Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
